00047 static char magic[] = "BlenMIdx";
00048 static char temp_ext [] = "_part";
00049 
00050 static int proxy_sizes[] = { IMB_PROXY_25, IMB_PROXY_50, IMB_PROXY_75,
00051                              IMB_PROXY_100 };
00052 static float proxy_fac[] = { 0.25, 0.50, 0.75, 1.00 };
00053 
00054 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
00055 static int tc_types[] = { IMB_TC_RECORD_RUN,
00056                           IMB_TC_FREE_RUN,
00057                           IMB_TC_INTERPOLATED_REC_DATE_FREE_RUN,
00058                           IMB_TC_RECORD_RUN_NO_GAPS,
00059                         };
00060 #endif

00062 #define INDEX_FILE_VERSION 1
00063 
00064 /* ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00065    - time code index functions
00066    ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00067 
00068 anim_index_builder * IMB_index_builder_create(const char * name)
00069 {
00070 
00071     anim_index_builder * rv
00072             = MEM_callocN( sizeof(struct anim_index_builder),
00073                            "index builder");
00074 
00075     fprintf(stderr, "Starting work on index: %s\n", name);
00076 
00077     BLI_strncpy(rv->name, name, sizeof(rv->name));
00078     BLI_strncpy(rv->temp_name, name, sizeof(rv->temp_name));
00079 
00080     strcat(rv->temp_name, temp_ext);
00081 
00082     BLI_make_existing_file(rv->temp_name);
00083 
00084     rv->fp = BLI_fopen(rv->temp_name, "wb");
00085 
00086     if (!rv->fp) {
00087         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't open index target: %s! "
00088             "Index build broken!\n", rv->temp_name);
00089         MEM_freeN(rv);
00090         return NULL;
00091     }
00092 
00093     fprintf(rv->fp, "%s%c%.3d", magic, (ENDIAN_ORDER==B_ENDIAN)?'V':'v',
00094         INDEX_FILE_VERSION);
00095 
00096     return rv;
00097 }
00098 
00099 void IMB_index_builder_add_entry(anim_index_builder * fp, 
00100                  int frameno, unsigned long long seek_pos,
00101                  unsigned long long seek_pos_dts,
00102                  unsigned long long pts)
00103 {
00104     fwrite(&frameno, sizeof(int), 1, fp->fp);
00105     fwrite(&seek_pos, sizeof(unsigned long long), 1, fp->fp);
00106     fwrite(&seek_pos_dts, sizeof(unsigned long long), 1, fp->fp);
00107     fwrite(&pts, sizeof(unsigned long long), 1, fp->fp);
00108 }
00109 
00110 void IMB_index_builder_proc_frame(anim_index_builder * fp, 
00111                   unsigned char * buffer,
00112                   int data_size,
00113                   int frameno, unsigned long long seek_pos,
00114                   unsigned long long seek_pos_dts,
00115                   unsigned long long pts)
00116 {
00117     if (fp->proc_frame) {
00118         anim_index_entry e;
00119         e.frameno = frameno;
00120         e.seek_pos = seek_pos;
00121         e.seek_pos_dts = seek_pos_dts;
00122         e.pts = pts;
00123 
00124         fp->proc_frame(fp, buffer, data_size, &e);
00125     }
00126     else {
00127         IMB_index_builder_add_entry(fp, frameno, seek_pos,
00128                         seek_pos_dts, pts);
00129     }
00130 }
00131 
00132 void IMB_index_builder_finish(anim_index_builder * fp, int rollback)
00133 {
00134     if (fp->delete_priv_data) {
00135         fp->delete_priv_data(fp);
00136     }
00137 
00138     fclose(fp->fp);
00139     
00140     if (rollback) {
00141         unlink(fp->temp_name);
00142     }
00143     else {
00144         unlink(fp->name);
00145         BLI_rename(fp->temp_name, fp->name);
00146     }
00147 
00148     MEM_freeN(fp);
00149 }
00150 
00151 struct anim_index * IMB_indexer_open(const char * name)
00152 {
00153     char header[13];
00154     struct anim_index * idx;
00155     FILE * fp = BLI_fopen(name, "rb");
00156     int i;
00157 
00158     if (!fp) {
00159         return NULL;
00160     }
00161 
00162     if (fread(header, 12, 1, fp) != 1) {
00163         fclose(fp);
00164         return NULL;
00165     }
00166 
00167     header[12] = 0;
00168 
00169     if (memcmp(header, magic, 8) != 0) {
00170         fclose(fp);
00171         return NULL;
00172     }
00173 
00174     if (atoi(header+9) != INDEX_FILE_VERSION) {
00175         fclose(fp);
00176         return NULL;
00177     }
00178 
00179     idx = MEM_callocN( sizeof(struct anim_index), "anim_index");
00180 
00181     BLI_strncpy(idx->name, name, sizeof(idx->name));
00182     
00183     fseek(fp, 0, SEEK_END);
00184 
00185     idx->num_entries = (ftell(fp) - 12)
00186         / (sizeof(int) // framepos
00187            + sizeof(unsigned long long) // seek_pos
00188            + sizeof(unsigned long long) // seek_pos_dts
00189            + sizeof(unsigned long long) // pts
00190             );
00191     
00192     fseek(fp, 12, SEEK_SET);
00193 
00194     idx->entries = MEM_callocN( sizeof(struct anim_index_entry) 
00195                     * idx->num_entries, "anim_index_entries");
00196 
00197     for (i = 0; i < idx->num_entries; i++) {
00198         fread(&idx->entries[i].frameno,
00199               sizeof(int), 1, fp);
00200         fread(&idx->entries[i].seek_pos,
00201               sizeof(unsigned long long), 1, fp);
00202         fread(&idx->entries[i].seek_pos_dts,
00203               sizeof(unsigned long long), 1, fp);
00204         fread(&idx->entries[i].pts,
00205               sizeof(unsigned long long), 1, fp);
00206     }
00207 
00208     if (((ENDIAN_ORDER == B_ENDIAN) != (header[8] == 'V'))) {
00209         for (i = 0; i < idx->num_entries; i++) {
00210             SWITCH_INT(idx->entries[i].frameno);
00211             SWITCH_INT64(idx->entries[i].seek_pos);
00212             SWITCH_INT64(idx->entries[i].seek_pos_dts);
00213             SWITCH_INT64(idx->entries[i].pts);
00214         }
00215     }
00216 
00217     fclose(fp);
00218 
00219     return idx;
00220 }
00221 
00222 unsigned long long IMB_indexer_get_seek_pos(
00223     struct anim_index * idx, int frame_index)
00224 {
00225     if (frame_index < 0) {
00226         frame_index = 0;
00227     }
00228     if (frame_index >= idx->num_entries) {
00229         frame_index = idx->num_entries - 1;
00230     }
00231     return idx->entries[frame_index].seek_pos;
00232 }
00233 
00234 unsigned long long IMB_indexer_get_seek_pos_dts(
00235     struct anim_index * idx, int frame_index)
00236 {
00237     if (frame_index < 0) {
00238         frame_index = 0;
00239     }
00240     if (frame_index >= idx->num_entries) {
00241         frame_index = idx->num_entries - 1;
00242     }
00243     return idx->entries[frame_index].seek_pos_dts;
00244 }
00245 
00246 int IMB_indexer_get_frame_index(struct anim_index * idx, int frameno)
00247 {
00248     int len = idx->num_entries;
00249     int half;
00250     int middle;
00251     int first = 0;
00252 
00253     /* bsearch (lower bound) the right index */
00254     
00255     while (len > 0) {
00256         half = len >> 1;
00257         middle = first;
00258 
00259         middle += half;
00260 
00261         if (idx->entries[middle].frameno < frameno) {
00262             first = middle;
00263             ++first;
00264             len = len - half - 1;
00265         }
00266         else {
00267             len = half;
00268         }
00269     }
00270 
00271     if (first == idx->num_entries) {
00272         return idx->num_entries - 1;
00273     }
00274     else {
00275         return first;
00276     }
00277 }
00278 
00279 unsigned long long IMB_indexer_get_pts(struct anim_index * idx, 
00280                        int frame_index)
00281 {
00282     if (frame_index < 0) {
00283         frame_index = 0;
00284     }
00285     if (frame_index >= idx->num_entries) {
00286         frame_index = idx->num_entries - 1;
00287     }
00288     return idx->entries[frame_index].pts;
00289 }
00290 
00291 int IMB_indexer_get_duration(struct anim_index * idx)
00292 {
00293     if (idx->num_entries == 0) {
00294         return 0;
00295     }
00296     return idx->entries[idx->num_entries-1].frameno + 1;
00297 }
00298 
00299 int IMB_indexer_can_scan(struct anim_index * idx, 
00300              int old_frame_index, int new_frame_index)
00301 {
00302     /* makes only sense, if it is the same I-Frame and we are not
00303      * trying to run backwards in time... */
00304     return (IMB_indexer_get_seek_pos(idx, old_frame_index)
00305         == IMB_indexer_get_seek_pos(idx, new_frame_index) && 
00306         old_frame_index < new_frame_index);
00307 }
00308 
00309 void IMB_indexer_close(struct anim_index * idx)
00310 {
00311     MEM_freeN(idx->entries);
00312     MEM_freeN(idx);
00313 }
00314 
00315 int IMB_proxy_size_to_array_index(IMB_Proxy_Size pr_size)
00316 {
00317     switch (pr_size) {
00318     case IMB_PROXY_NONE: /* if we got here, something is broken anyways,
00319                 so sane defaults... */
00320         return 0;
00321     case IMB_PROXY_25:
00322         return 0;
00323     case IMB_PROXY_50:
00324         return 1;
00325     case IMB_PROXY_75:
00326         return 2;
00327     case IMB_PROXY_100:
00328         return 3;
00329     default:
00330         return 0;
00331     };
00332     return 0;
00333 }
00334 
00335 int IMB_timecode_to_array_index(IMB_Timecode_Type tc)
00336 {
00337     switch (tc) {
00338     case IMB_TC_NONE: /* if we got here, something is broken anyways,
00339                 so sane defaults... */
00340         return 0;
00341     case IMB_TC_RECORD_RUN:
00342         return 0;
00343     case IMB_TC_FREE_RUN:
00344         return 1;
00345     case IMB_TC_INTERPOLATED_REC_DATE_FREE_RUN:
00346         return 2;
00347     case IMB_TC_RECORD_RUN_NO_GAPS:
00348         return 3;
00349     default:
00350         return 0;
00351     };
00352     return 0;
00353 }

00359 
00360 static void get_index_dir(struct anim * anim, char * index_dir)
00361 {
00362     if (!anim->index_dir[0]) {
00363         char fname[FILE_MAXFILE];
00364         BLI_strncpy(index_dir, anim->name, FILE_MAXDIR);
00365         BLI_splitdirstring(index_dir, fname);
00366         BLI_join_dirfile(index_dir, FILE_MAXDIR, index_dir, "BL_proxy");
00367         BLI_join_dirfile(index_dir, FILE_MAXDIR, index_dir, fname);
00368     }
00369     else {
00370         BLI_strncpy(index_dir, anim->index_dir, FILE_MAXDIR);
00371     }
00372 }
00373 
00374 static void get_proxy_filename(struct anim * anim, IMB_Proxy_Size preview_size,
00375                    char * fname, int temp)
00376 {
00377     char index_dir[FILE_MAXDIR];
00378     int i = IMB_proxy_size_to_array_index(preview_size);
00379 
00380     char proxy_name[256];
00381     char proxy_temp_name[256];
00382     char stream_suffix[20];
00383     
00384     stream_suffix[0] = 0;
00385 
00386     if (anim->streamindex > 0) {
00387         BLI_snprintf(stream_suffix, sizeof(stream_suffix), "_st%d", anim->streamindex);
00388     }
00389 
00390     BLI_snprintf(proxy_name, sizeof(proxy_name), "proxy_%d%s.avi",
00391              (int) (proxy_fac[i] * 100), stream_suffix);
00392     BLI_snprintf(proxy_temp_name, sizeof(proxy_temp_name), "proxy_%d%s_part.avi",
00393              (int) (proxy_fac[i] * 100), stream_suffix);
00394 
00395     get_index_dir(anim, index_dir);
00396 
00397     BLI_join_dirfile(fname, FILE_MAXFILE + FILE_MAXDIR, index_dir, 
00398                      temp ? proxy_temp_name : proxy_name);
00399 }
00400 
00401 static void get_tc_filename(struct anim * anim, IMB_Timecode_Type tc,
00402                 char * fname)
00403 {
00404     char index_dir[FILE_MAXDIR];
00405     int i = IMB_timecode_to_array_index(tc);
00406     const char * index_names[] = {
00407         "record_run%s.blen_tc",
00408         "free_run%s.blen_tc",
00409         "interp_free_run%s.blen_tc",
00410         "record_run_no_gaps%s.blen_tc"};
00411 
00412     char stream_suffix[20];
00413     char index_name[256];
00414     
00415     stream_suffix[0] = 0;
00416 
00417     if (anim->streamindex > 0) {
00418         BLI_snprintf(stream_suffix, 20, "_st%d", anim->streamindex);
00419     }
00420     
00421     BLI_snprintf(index_name, 256, index_names[i], stream_suffix);
00422 
00423     get_index_dir(anim, index_dir);
00424     
00425     BLI_join_dirfile(fname, FILE_MAXFILE + FILE_MAXDIR, 
00426                      index_dir, index_name);
00427 }

00441 
00442 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
00443 
00444 struct proxy_output_ctx {
00445     AVFormatContext* of;
00446     AVStream* st;
00447     AVCodecContext* c;
00448     AVCodec* codec;
00449     struct SwsContext * sws_ctx;
00450     AVFrame* frame;
00451     uint8_t* video_buffer;
00452     int video_buffersize;
00453     int cfra;
00454     int proxy_size;
00455     int orig_height;
00456     struct anim * anim;
00457 };
00458 
00459 // work around stupid swscaler 16 bytes alignment bug...
00460 
00461 static int round_up(int x, int mod)
00462 {
00463     return x + ((mod - (x % mod)) % mod);
00464 }
00465 
00466 static struct proxy_output_ctx * alloc_proxy_output_ffmpeg(
00467     struct anim * anim,
00468     AVStream * st, int proxy_size, int width, int height,
00469     int quality)
00470 {
00471     struct proxy_output_ctx * rv = MEM_callocN(
00472         sizeof(struct proxy_output_ctx), "alloc_proxy_output");
00473     
00474     char fname[FILE_MAX];
00475     int ffmpeg_quality;
00476 
00477     // JPEG requires this
00478     width = round_up(width, 8);
00479     height = round_up(height, 8);
00480 
00481     rv->proxy_size = proxy_size;
00482     rv->anim = anim;
00483 
00484     get_proxy_filename(rv->anim, rv->proxy_size, fname, TRUE);
00485     BLI_make_existing_file(fname);
00486 
00487     rv->of = avformat_alloc_context();
00488     rv->of->oformat = av_guess_format("avi", NULL, NULL);
00489     
00490     BLI_snprintf(rv->of->filename, sizeof(rv->of->filename), "%s", fname);
00491 
00492     fprintf(stderr, "Starting work on proxy: %s\n", rv->of->filename);
00493 
00494     rv->st = av_new_stream(rv->of, 0);
00495     rv->c = rv->st->codec;
00496     rv->c->codec_type = AVMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO;
00497     rv->c->codec_id = CODEC_ID_MJPEG;
00498     rv->c->width = width;
00499     rv->c->height = height;
00500 
00501     rv->of->oformat->video_codec = rv->c->codec_id;
00502     rv->codec = avcodec_find_encoder(rv->c->codec_id);
00503 
00504     if (!rv->codec) {
00505         fprintf(stderr, "No ffmpeg MJPEG encoder available? "
00506             "Proxy not built!\n");
00507         av_free(rv->of);
00508         return NULL;
00509     }
00510 
00511     if (rv->codec->pix_fmts) {
00512         rv->c->pix_fmt = rv->codec->pix_fmts[0];
00513     }
00514     else {
00515         rv->c->pix_fmt = PIX_FMT_YUVJ420P;
00516     }
00517 
00518     rv->c->sample_aspect_ratio 
00519         = rv->st->sample_aspect_ratio 
00520         = st->codec->sample_aspect_ratio;
00521 
00522     rv->c->time_base.den = 25;
00523     rv->c->time_base.num = 1;
00524     rv->st->time_base = rv->c->time_base;
00525 
00526     /* there's no  way to set JPEG quality in the same way as in AVI JPEG and image sequence,
00527      * but this seems to be giving expected quality result */
00528     ffmpeg_quality = (int)(1.0f + 30.0f * (1.0f - (float)quality / 100.0f) + 0.5f);
00529     av_set_int(rv->c, "qmin", ffmpeg_quality);
00530     av_set_int(rv->c, "qmax", ffmpeg_quality);
00531 
00532     if (rv->of->flags & AVFMT_GLOBALHEADER) {
00533         rv->c->flags |= CODEC_FLAG_GLOBAL_HEADER;
00534     }
00535 
00536     if (av_set_parameters(rv->of, NULL) < 0) {
00537         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't set output parameters? "
00538             "Proxy not built!\n");
00539         av_free(rv->of);
00540         return 0;
00541     }
00542 
00543     if (avio_open(&rv->of->pb, fname, AVIO_FLAG_WRITE) < 0) {
00544         fprintf(stderr, "Couldn't open outputfile! "
00545             "Proxy not built!\n");
00546         av_free(rv->of);
00547         return 0;
00548     }
00549 
00550     avcodec_open(rv->c, rv->codec);
00551 
00552     rv->video_buffersize = 2000000;
00553     rv->video_buffer = (uint8_t*)MEM_mallocN(
00554         rv->video_buffersize, "FFMPEG video buffer");
00555 
00556     rv->orig_height = st->codec->height;
00557 
00558     if (st->codec->width != width || st->codec->height != height ||
00559             st->codec->pix_fmt != rv->c->pix_fmt)
00560     {
00561         rv->frame = avcodec_alloc_frame();
00562         avpicture_fill((AVPicture*) rv->frame,
00563                        MEM_mallocN(avpicture_get_size(
00564                                        rv->c->pix_fmt,
00565                                        round_up(width, 16), height),
00566                                    "alloc proxy output frame"),
00567                        rv->c->pix_fmt, round_up(width, 16), height);
00568 
00569         rv->sws_ctx = sws_getContext(
00570             st->codec->width,
00571             st->codec->height,
00572             st->codec->pix_fmt,
00573             width, height,
00574             rv->c->pix_fmt,
00575             SWS_FAST_BILINEAR | SWS_PRINT_INFO,
00576             NULL, NULL, NULL);
00577     }
00578 
00579     av_write_header(rv->of);
00580 
00581     return rv;
00582 }
00583 
00584 static int add_to_proxy_output_ffmpeg(
00585     struct proxy_output_ctx * ctx, AVFrame * frame)
00586 {
00587     int outsize = 0;
00588 
00589     if (!ctx) {
00590         return 0;
00591     }
00592 
00593     if (    ctx->sws_ctx && frame &&
00594             (frame->data[0] || frame->data[1] ||
00595              frame->data[2] || frame->data[3]))
00596     {
00597         sws_scale(ctx->sws_ctx, (const uint8_t * const*) frame->data,
00598                   frame->linesize, 0, ctx->orig_height,
00599                   ctx->frame->data, ctx->frame->linesize);
00600     }
00601 
00602     frame = ctx->sws_ctx ? (frame ? ctx->frame : 0) : frame;
00603 
00604     if (frame) {
00605         frame->pts = ctx->cfra++;
00606     }
00607 
00608     outsize = avcodec_encode_video(
00609         ctx->c, ctx->video_buffer, ctx->video_buffersize, 
00610         frame);
00611 
00612     if (outsize < 0) {
00613         fprintf(stderr, "Error encoding proxy frame %d for '%s'\n", 
00614             ctx->cfra - 1, ctx->of->filename);
00615         return 0;
00616     }
00617 
00618     if (outsize != 0) {
00619         AVPacket packet;
00620         av_init_packet(&packet);
00621 
00622         if (ctx->c->coded_frame->pts != AV_NOPTS_VALUE) {
00623             packet.pts = av_rescale_q(ctx->c->coded_frame->pts,
00624                           ctx->c->time_base,
00625                           ctx->st->time_base);
00626         }
00627         if (ctx->c->coded_frame->key_frame)
00628             packet.flags |= AV_PKT_FLAG_KEY;
00629 
00630         packet.stream_index = ctx->st->index;
00631         packet.data = ctx->video_buffer;
00632         packet.size = outsize;
00633 
00634         if (av_interleaved_write_frame(ctx->of, &packet) != 0) {
00635             fprintf(stderr, "Error writing proxy frame %d "
00636                 "into '%s'\n", ctx->cfra - 1, 
00637                 ctx->of->filename);
00638             return 0;
00639         }
00640 
00641         return 1;
00642     }
00643     else {
00644         return 0;
00645     }
00646 }
00647 
00648 static void free_proxy_output_ffmpeg(struct proxy_output_ctx * ctx,
00649                      int rollback)
00650 {
00651     int i;
00652     char fname[FILE_MAX];
00653     char fname_tmp[FILE_MAX];
00654 
00655     if (!ctx) {
00656         return;
00657     }
00658 
00659     if (!rollback) {
00660         while (add_to_proxy_output_ffmpeg(ctx, NULL)) {}
00661     }
00662 
00663     avcodec_flush_buffers(ctx->c);
00664 
00665     av_write_trailer(ctx->of);
00666     
00667     avcodec_close(ctx->c);
00668     
00669     for (i = 0; i < ctx->of->nb_streams; i++) {
00670         if (&ctx->of->streams[i]) {
00671             av_freep(&ctx->of->streams[i]);
00672         }
00673     }
00674 
00675     if (ctx->of->oformat) {
00676         if (!(ctx->of->oformat->flags & AVFMT_NOFILE)) {
00677             avio_close(ctx->of->pb);
00678         }
00679     }
00680     av_free(ctx->of);
00681 
00682     MEM_freeN(ctx->video_buffer);
00683 
00684     if (ctx->sws_ctx) {
00685         sws_freeContext(ctx->sws_ctx);
00686 
00687         MEM_freeN(ctx->frame->data[0]);
00688         av_free(ctx->frame);
00689     }
00690 
00691     get_proxy_filename(ctx->anim, ctx->proxy_size, 
00692                        fname_tmp, TRUE);
00693 
00694     if (rollback) {
00695         unlink(fname_tmp);
00696     }
00697     else {
00698         get_proxy_filename(ctx->anim, ctx->proxy_size, 
00699                            fname, FALSE);
00700         unlink(fname);
00701         BLI_rename(fname_tmp, fname);
00702     }
00703     
00704     MEM_freeN(ctx);
00705 }
00706 
00707 typedef struct FFmpegIndexBuilderContext {
00708     int anim_type;
00709 
00710     AVFormatContext *iFormatCtx;
00711     AVCodecContext *iCodecCtx;
00712     AVCodec *iCodec;
00713     AVStream *iStream;
00714     int videoStream;
00715 
00716     int num_proxy_sizes;
00717     int num_indexers;
00718 
00719     struct proxy_output_ctx * proxy_ctx[IMB_PROXY_MAX_SLOT];
00720     anim_index_builder * indexer [IMB_TC_MAX_SLOT];
00721 
00722     IMB_Timecode_Type tcs_in_use;
00723     IMB_Proxy_Size proxy_sizes_in_use;
00724 } FFmpegIndexBuilderContext;
00725 
00726 static IndexBuildContext *index_ffmpeg_create_context(struct anim *anim, IMB_Timecode_Type tcs_in_use,
00727                                                       IMB_Proxy_Size proxy_sizes_in_use, int quality)
00728 {
00729     FFmpegIndexBuilderContext *context = MEM_callocN(sizeof(FFmpegIndexBuilderContext), "FFmpeg index builder context");
00730     int num_proxy_sizes = IMB_PROXY_MAX_SLOT;
00731     int num_indexers = IMB_TC_MAX_SLOT;
00732     int i, streamcount;
00733 
00734     context->tcs_in_use = tcs_in_use;
00735     context->proxy_sizes_in_use = proxy_sizes_in_use;
00736     context->num_proxy_sizes = IMB_PROXY_MAX_SLOT;
00737     context->num_indexers = IMB_TC_MAX_SLOT;
00738 
00739     memset(context->proxy_ctx, 0, sizeof(context->proxy_ctx));
00740     memset(context->indexer, 0, sizeof(context->indexer));
00741 
00742     if (av_open_input_file(&context->iFormatCtx, anim->name, NULL, 0, NULL) != 0) {
00743         MEM_freeN(context);
00744         return NULL;
00745     }
00746 
00747     if (av_find_stream_info(context->iFormatCtx) < 0) {
00748         av_close_input_file(context->iFormatCtx);
00749         MEM_freeN(context);
00750         return NULL;
00751     }
00752 
00753     streamcount = anim->streamindex;
00754 
00755     /* Find the video stream */
00756     context->videoStream = -1;
00757     for (i = 0; i < context->iFormatCtx->nb_streams; i++)
00758         if (context->iFormatCtx->streams[i]->codec->codec_type
00759            == AVMEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO) {
00760             if (streamcount > 0) {
00761                 streamcount--;
00762                 continue;
00763             }
00764             context->videoStream = i;
00765             break;
00766         }
00767 
00768     if (context->videoStream == -1) {
00769         av_close_input_file(context->iFormatCtx);
00770         MEM_freeN(context);
00771         return NULL;
00772     }
00773 
00774     context->iStream = context->iFormatCtx->streams[context->videoStream];
00775     context->iCodecCtx = context->iStream->codec;
00776 
00777     context->iCodec = avcodec_find_decoder(context->iCodecCtx->codec_id);
00778 
00779     if (context->iCodec == NULL) {
00780         av_close_input_file(context->iFormatCtx);
00781         MEM_freeN(context);
00782         return NULL;
00783     }
00784 
00785     context->iCodecCtx->workaround_bugs = 1;
00786 
00787     if (avcodec_open(context->iCodecCtx, context->iCodec) < 0) {
00788         av_close_input_file(context->iFormatCtx);
00789         MEM_freeN(context);
00790         return NULL;
00791     }
00792 
00793     for (i = 0; i < num_proxy_sizes; i++) {
00794         if (proxy_sizes_in_use & proxy_sizes[i]) {
00795             context->proxy_ctx[i] = alloc_proxy_output_ffmpeg(
00796                 anim, context->iStream, proxy_sizes[i],
00797                 context->iCodecCtx->width * proxy_fac[i],
00798                 context->iCodecCtx->height * proxy_fac[i],
00799                 quality);
00800             if (!context->proxy_ctx[i]) {
00801                 proxy_sizes_in_use &= ~proxy_sizes[i];
00802             }
00803         }
00804     }
00805 
00806     for (i = 0; i < num_indexers; i++) {
00807         if (tcs_in_use & tc_types[i]) {
00808             char fname[FILE_MAX];
00809 
00810             get_tc_filename(anim, tc_types[i], fname);
00811 
00812             context->indexer[i] = IMB_index_builder_create(fname);
00813             if (!context->indexer[i]) {
00814                 tcs_in_use &= ~tc_types[i];
00815             }
00816         }
00817     }
00818 
00819     return (IndexBuildContext *)context;
00820 }
00821 
00822 static void index_rebuild_ffmpeg_finish(FFmpegIndexBuilderContext *context, int stop)
00823 {
00824     int i;
00825 
00826     for (i = 0; i < context->num_indexers; i++) {
00827         if (context->tcs_in_use & tc_types[i]) {
00828             IMB_index_builder_finish(context->indexer[i], stop);
00829         }
00830     }
00831 
00832     for (i = 0; i < context->num_proxy_sizes; i++) {
00833         if (context->proxy_sizes_in_use & proxy_sizes[i]) {
00834             free_proxy_output_ffmpeg(context->proxy_ctx[i], stop);
00835         }
00836     }
00837 
00838     MEM_freeN(context);
00839 }
00840 
00841 static int index_rebuild_ffmpeg(FFmpegIndexBuilderContext *context,
00842                                 short *stop, short *do_update, float *progress)
00843 {
00844     int i;
00845     unsigned long long seek_pos = 0;
00846     unsigned long long last_seek_pos = 0;
00847     unsigned long long seek_pos_dts = 0;
00848     unsigned long long seek_pos_pts = 0;
00849     unsigned long long last_seek_pos_dts = 0;
00850     unsigned long long start_pts = 0;
00851     double frame_rate;
00852     double pts_time_base;
00853     int frameno = 0, frameno_gapless = 0;
00854     int start_pts_set = FALSE;
00855     AVFrame* in_frame = 0;
00856     AVPacket next_packet;
00857     uint64_t stream_size;
00858 
00859     in_frame = avcodec_alloc_frame();
00860 
00861     stream_size = avio_size(context->iFormatCtx->pb);
00862 
00863     frame_rate = av_q2d(context->iStream->r_frame_rate);
00864     pts_time_base = av_q2d(context->iStream->time_base);
00865 
00866     while (av_read_frame(context->iFormatCtx, &next_packet) >= 0) {
00867         int frame_finished = 0;
00868         float next_progress =  (float)((int)floor(((double) next_packet.pos) * 100 /
00869                                            ((double) stream_size)+0.5)) / 100;
00870 
00871         if (*progress != next_progress) {
00872             *progress = next_progress;
00873             *do_update = 1;
00874         }
00875 
00876         if (*stop) {
00877             av_free_packet(&next_packet);
00878             break;
00879         }
00880 
00881         if (next_packet.stream_index == context->videoStream) {
00882             if (next_packet.flags & AV_PKT_FLAG_KEY) {
00883                 last_seek_pos = seek_pos;
00884                 last_seek_pos_dts = seek_pos_dts;
00885                 seek_pos = next_packet.pos;
00886                 seek_pos_dts = next_packet.dts;
00887                 seek_pos_pts = next_packet.pts;
00888             }
00889 
00890             avcodec_decode_video2(
00891                 context->iCodecCtx, in_frame, &frame_finished,
00892                 &next_packet);
00893         }
00894 
00895         if (frame_finished) {
00896             unsigned long long s_pos = seek_pos;
00897             unsigned long long s_dts = seek_pos_dts;
00898             unsigned long long pts 
00899                 = av_get_pts_from_frame(context->iFormatCtx, in_frame);
00900 
00901             for (i = 0; i < context->num_proxy_sizes; i++) {
00902                 add_to_proxy_output_ffmpeg(
00903                     context->proxy_ctx[i], in_frame);
00904             }
00905 
00906             if (!start_pts_set) {
00907                 start_pts = pts;
00908                 start_pts_set = TRUE;
00909             }
00910 
00911             frameno = floor((pts - start_pts)
00912                 * pts_time_base * frame_rate + 0.5f);
00913 
00914             /* decoding starts *always* on I-Frames,
00915                so: P-Frames won't work, even if all the
00916                information is in place, when we seek
00917                to the I-Frame presented *after* the P-Frame,
00918                but located before the P-Frame within
00919                the stream */
00920 
00921             if (pts < seek_pos_pts) {
00922                 s_pos = last_seek_pos;
00923                 s_dts = last_seek_pos_dts;
00924             }
00925 
00926             for (i = 0; i < context->num_indexers; i++) {
00927                 if (context->tcs_in_use & tc_types[i]) {
00928                     int tc_frameno = frameno;
00929 
00930                     if (tc_types[i] == IMB_TC_RECORD_RUN_NO_GAPS)
00931                         tc_frameno = frameno_gapless;
00932 
00933                     IMB_index_builder_proc_frame(
00934                         context->indexer[i],
00935                         next_packet.data, 
00936                         next_packet.size,
00937                         tc_frameno,
00938                         s_pos, s_dts, pts);
00939                 }
00940             }
00941 
00942             frameno_gapless++;
00943         }
00944         av_free_packet(&next_packet);
00945     }
00946 
00947     av_free(in_frame);
00948 
00949     return 1;
00950 }
00951 
00952 #endif
00953 
00954 /* ----------------------------------------------------------------------
00955    - internal AVI (fallback) rebuilder
00956    ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
00957 
00958 typedef struct FallbackIndexBuilderContext {
00959     int anim_type;
00960 
00961     struct anim *anim;
00962     AviMovie *proxy_ctx[IMB_PROXY_MAX_SLOT];
00963     IMB_Proxy_Size proxy_sizes_in_use;
00964 } FallbackIndexBuilderContext;
00965 
00966 static AviMovie * alloc_proxy_output_avi(
00967     struct anim * anim, char * filename, int width, int height,
00968     int quality)
00969 {
00970     int x, y;
00971     AviFormat format;
00972     double framerate;
00973     AviMovie * avi;
00974     short frs_sec = 25;      /* it doesn't really matter for proxies,
00975                     but sane defaults help anyways...*/
00976     float frs_sec_base = 1.0;
00977 
00978     IMB_anim_get_fps(anim, &frs_sec, &frs_sec_base);
00979     
00980     x = width;
00981     y = height;
00982 
00983     framerate= (double) frs_sec / (double) frs_sec_base;
00984     
00985     avi = MEM_mallocN (sizeof(AviMovie), "avimovie");
00986 
00987     format = AVI_FORMAT_MJPEG;
00988 
00989     if (AVI_open_compress (filename, avi, 1, format) != AVI_ERROR_NONE) {
00990         MEM_freeN(avi);
00991         return NULL;
00992     }
00993             
00994     AVI_set_compress_option (avi, AVI_OPTION_TYPE_MAIN, 0, AVI_OPTION_WIDTH, &x);
00995     AVI_set_compress_option (avi, AVI_OPTION_TYPE_MAIN, 0, AVI_OPTION_HEIGHT, &y);
00996     AVI_set_compress_option (avi, AVI_OPTION_TYPE_MAIN, 0, AVI_OPTION_QUALITY, &quality);       
00997     AVI_set_compress_option (avi, AVI_OPTION_TYPE_MAIN, 0, AVI_OPTION_FRAMERATE, &framerate);
00998 
00999     avi->interlace= 0;
01000     avi->odd_fields= 0;
01001 
01002     return avi;
01003 }
01004 
01005 static IndexBuildContext *index_fallback_create_context(struct anim *anim, IMB_Timecode_Type UNUSED(tcs_in_use),
01006                                                         IMB_Proxy_Size proxy_sizes_in_use, int quality)
01007 {
01008     FallbackIndexBuilderContext *context;
01009     int i;
01010 
01011     /* since timecode indices only work with ffmpeg right now,
01012        don't know a sensible fallback here...
01013 
01014        so no proxies, no game to play...
01015     */
01016     if (proxy_sizes_in_use == IMB_PROXY_NONE) {
01017         return NULL;
01018     }
01019 
01020     context = MEM_callocN(sizeof(FallbackIndexBuilderContext), "fallback index builder context");
01021 
01022     context->anim = anim;
01023     context->proxy_sizes_in_use = proxy_sizes_in_use;
01024 
01025     memset(context->proxy_ctx, 0, sizeof(context->proxy_ctx));
01026 
01027     for (i = 0; i < IMB_PROXY_MAX_SLOT; i++) {
01028         if (context->proxy_sizes_in_use & proxy_sizes[i]) {
01029             char fname[FILE_MAX];
01030 
01031             get_proxy_filename(anim, proxy_sizes[i], fname, TRUE);
01032             BLI_make_existing_file(fname);
01033 
01034             context->proxy_ctx[i] = alloc_proxy_output_avi(anim, fname,
01035                 anim->x * proxy_fac[i], anim->y * proxy_fac[i], quality);
01036         }
01037     }
01038 
01039     return (IndexBuildContext *)context;
01040 }
01041 
01042 static void index_rebuild_fallback_finish(FallbackIndexBuilderContext *context, int stop)
01043 {
01044     struct anim *anim = context->anim;
01045     char fname[FILE_MAX];
01046     char fname_tmp[FILE_MAX];
01047     int i;
01048 
01049     for (i = 0; i < IMB_PROXY_MAX_SLOT; i++) {
01050         if (context->proxy_sizes_in_use & proxy_sizes[i]) {
01051             AVI_close_compress(context->proxy_ctx[i]);
01052             MEM_freeN(context->proxy_ctx[i]);
01053 
01054             get_proxy_filename(anim, proxy_sizes[i], fname_tmp, TRUE);
01055             get_proxy_filename(anim, proxy_sizes[i], fname, FALSE);
01056 
01057             if (stop) {
01058                 unlink(fname_tmp);
01059             }
01060             else {
01061                 unlink(fname);
01062                 rename(fname_tmp, fname);
01063             }
01064         }
01065     }
01066 }
01067 
01068 static void index_rebuild_fallback(FallbackIndexBuilderContext *context,
01069                                    short *stop, short *do_update, float *progress)
01070 {
01071     int cnt = IMB_anim_get_duration(context->anim, IMB_TC_NONE);
01072     int i, pos;
01073     struct anim *anim = context->anim;
01074 
01075     for (pos = 0; pos < cnt; pos++) {
01076         struct ImBuf *ibuf = IMB_anim_absolute(anim, pos, IMB_TC_NONE, IMB_PROXY_NONE);
01077         struct ImBuf *tmp_ibuf = IMB_dupImBuf(ibuf);
01078         float next_progress = (float) pos / (float) cnt;
01079 
01080         if (*progress != next_progress) {
01081             *progress = next_progress;
01082             *do_update = 1;
01083         }
01084         
01085         if (*stop) {
01086             break;
01087         }
01088 
01089         IMB_flipy(tmp_ibuf);
01090 
01091         for (i = 0; i < IMB_PROXY_MAX_SLOT; i++) {
01092             if (context->proxy_sizes_in_use & proxy_sizes[i]) {
01093                 int x = anim->x * proxy_fac[i];
01094                 int y = anim->y * proxy_fac[i];
01095 
01096                 struct ImBuf * s_ibuf = IMB_dupImBuf(tmp_ibuf);
01097 
01098                 IMB_scalefastImBuf(s_ibuf, x, y);
01099 
01100                 IMB_convert_rgba_to_abgr(s_ibuf);
01101     
01102                 AVI_write_frame (context->proxy_ctx[i], pos, 
01103                          AVI_FORMAT_RGB32, 
01104                          s_ibuf->rect, x * y * 4);
01105 
01106                 /* note that libavi free's the buffer... */
01107                 s_ibuf->rect = NULL;
01108 
01109                 IMB_freeImBuf(s_ibuf);
01110             }
01111         }
01112 
01113         IMB_freeImBuf(tmp_ibuf);
01114         IMB_freeImBuf(ibuf);
01115     }
01116 }
01117 
01118 /* ----------------------------------------------------------------------
01119    - public API
01120    ---------------------------------------------------------------------- */
01121 
01122 IndexBuildContext *IMB_anim_index_rebuild_context(struct anim *anim, IMB_Timecode_Type tcs_in_use,
01123                                                          IMB_Proxy_Size proxy_sizes_in_use, int quality)
01124 {
01125     IndexBuildContext *context = NULL;
01126 
01127     switch (anim->curtype) {
01128 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
01129     case ANIM_FFMPEG:
01130         context = index_ffmpeg_create_context(anim, tcs_in_use, proxy_sizes_in_use, quality);
01131         break;
01132 #endif
01133     default:
01134         context = index_fallback_create_context(anim, tcs_in_use, proxy_sizes_in_use, quality);
01135         break;
01136     }
01137 
01138     if (context)
01139         context->anim_type = anim->curtype;
01140 
01141     return context;
01142 }
01143 
01144 void IMB_anim_index_rebuild(struct IndexBuildContext *context,
01145                             short *stop, short *do_update, float *progress)
01146 {
01147     switch (context->anim_type) {
01148 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
01149     case ANIM_FFMPEG:
01150         index_rebuild_ffmpeg((FFmpegIndexBuilderContext*)context, stop, do_update, progress);
01151         break;
01152 #endif
01153     default:
01154         index_rebuild_fallback((FallbackIndexBuilderContext*)context, stop, do_update, progress);
01155         break;
01156     }
01157 }
01158 
01159 void IMB_anim_index_rebuild_finish(IndexBuildContext *context, short stop)
01160 {
01161     switch (context->anim_type) {
01162 #ifdef WITH_FFMPEG
01163     case ANIM_FFMPEG:
01164         index_rebuild_ffmpeg_finish((FFmpegIndexBuilderContext*)context, stop);
01165         break;
01166 #endif
01167     default:
01168         index_rebuild_fallback_finish((FallbackIndexBuilderContext*)context, stop);
01169         break;
01170     }
01171 }
01172 
01173 
01174 void IMB_free_indices(struct anim * anim)
01175 {
01176     int i;
01177 
01178     for (i = 0; i < IMB_PROXY_MAX_SLOT; i++) {
01179         if (anim->proxy_anim[i]) {
01180             IMB_close_anim(anim->proxy_anim[i]);
01181             anim->proxy_anim[i] = NULL;
01182         }
01183     }
01184 
01185     for (i = 0; i < IMB_TC_MAX_SLOT; i++) {
01186         if (anim->curr_idx[i]) {
01187             IMB_indexer_close(anim->curr_idx[i]);
01188             anim->curr_idx[i] = NULL;
01189         }
01190     }
01191 
01192 
01193     anim->proxies_tried = 0;
01194     anim->indices_tried = 0;
01195 }
01196 
01197 void IMB_anim_set_index_dir(struct anim * anim, const char * dir)
01198 {
01199     if (strcmp(anim->index_dir, dir) == 0) {
01200         return;
01201     }
01202     BLI_strncpy(anim->index_dir, dir, sizeof(anim->index_dir));
01203 
01204     IMB_free_indices(anim);
01205 }
01206 
01207 struct anim * IMB_anim_open_proxy(
01208     struct anim * anim, IMB_Proxy_Size preview_size)
01209 {
01210     char fname[FILE_MAX];
01211     int i = IMB_proxy_size_to_array_index(preview_size);
01212 
01213     if (anim->proxy_anim[i]) {
01214         return anim->proxy_anim[i];
01215     }
01216 
01217     if (anim->proxies_tried & preview_size) {
01218         return NULL;
01219     }
01220 
01221     get_proxy_filename(anim, preview_size, fname, FALSE);
01222 
01223     anim->proxy_anim[i] = IMB_open_anim(fname, 0, 0);
01224     
01225     anim->proxies_tried |= preview_size;
01226 
01227     return anim->proxy_anim[i];
01228 }
01229 
01230 struct anim_index * IMB_anim_open_index(
01231     struct anim * anim, IMB_Timecode_Type tc)
01232 {
01233     char fname[FILE_MAX];
01234     int i = IMB_timecode_to_array_index(tc);
01235 
01236     if (anim->curr_idx[i]) {
01237         return anim->curr_idx[i];
01238     }
01239 
01240     if (anim->indices_tried & tc) {
01241         return NULL;
01242     }
01243 
01244     get_tc_filename(anim, tc, fname);
01245 
01246     anim->curr_idx[i] = IMB_indexer_open(fname);
01247     
01248     anim->indices_tried |= tc;
01249 
01250     return anim->curr_idx[i];
01251 }
01252 
01253 int IMB_anim_index_get_frame_index(struct anim * anim, IMB_Timecode_Type tc,
01254                    int position)
01255 {
01256     struct anim_index * idx = IMB_anim_open_index(anim, tc);
01257 
01258     if (!idx) {
01259         return position;
01260     }
01261 
01262     return IMB_indexer_get_frame_index(idx, position);
01263 }
